Classes and Workshops

We provide pragmatic instruction and guided practice with new techniques. We share what we’ve learned by experience—helping you go faster and more smoothly toward your goals. If you’d like a custom class for your team, let us know!

Upcoming Classes

Introduction to Trauma-Informed Design and User Research Methods

Get tickets

When: Thursday, November 6 · 11am - 12:30pm CST

Where: Online

Who is this for?

  • People who want to introduce practices in their organization to reduce accidental harm done by using their products.
  • Product designers, service designers,
  • Product managers and Owners
  • Anyone curious about applying trauma informed methods within their organization.

What will you learn?

  • What a Trauma Informed practice is, and how can it help your team.
  • The unexpected challenges of life after trauma and how it impacts daily activities.
  • How to apply a trauma informed lens to product design, research, and marketing.

Your Instructor: Gail Swanson

Questions? Email hello@haymarketstudio.co
